name: Happy Belly Gyoza Skin
description: Gyoza Skin is the perfect solution to have high quality, freshly made, healthy and delectable dim sum. Round, whitish dough sheets made from wheat flour, salt and water. Gyoza sheets become slightly translucent and slippery after cooking. The Japanese dumpling "gyoza", is usually filled with meat and vegetables.* Images for illustration purpose only. Product recieved may vary.
